lead_paragraph: Celtic and Rangers will meet for the first time in more than a year after the Glasgow sides, known as the "Old Firm", were drawn together in the semi-finals of the Scottish Cup.

headline.print_headline: Glasgow's 'Old Firm' Drawn Together in Scottish Cup
headline.main: Glasgow's 'Old Firm' Drawn Together in Scottish Cup
